_header: Jesu my spouse good and true
Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayers to; Satan, lament of; devil
_description: Prayer of a virgin to the crucifix (6 lines) and lament of the devil (4 lines) — five couplets

Lam78.Transcription:
Ihesu my spowse good and treweNe take me to noon other neweIn
                    thy kepyng I me betakeAnd the I haue chose to my makeSom tokyn of loue
                    thow send me blyueThat I the fend a way may dryueAllas alas I am
                    ynomeA woman me hath ouyr comeSethe I on here se crystys blodfor
                    fere I fle and wax wod
